sentences.en: ...the Sudan-based troops of the Libyan Islamic Legion.
sentences.cn: …在苏丹驻扎的利比里亚伊斯兰教军团部队。

sentences.en: Are you suggesting that we recall a legion from the frontier?
sentences.cn: 你是说我们应该把军团从前线召回 吗 ?

sentences.en: Books on this subject are legion.
sentences.cn: 关于这个题目的书籍多得不计其数.

sentences.en: Books that make their subjects unhappy are legion.
sentences.cn: 主题引起不愉快的书籍是不可胜数的.

sentences.en: He informally presented me with the Legion of Merit.
sentences.cn: 他非正式的告诉我所谓道德的军队.

sentences.en: He looked on his worldly interests as a legion of foes.
sentences.cn: 他把自己在人世间的利益看作是一大批敌人.

sentences.en: He thought about enlisting - about the Spanish legion - about a profession.
sentences.cn: 他想去打仗,想参加西班牙军团,想找个职业.

sentences.en: His delightful sense of humour won him a legion of friends.
sentences.cn: 他的幽默风趣为他赢得了众多的朋友。

sentences.en: It is impossible here to do justice to the complex history of the Legion.
sentences.cn: 在这里不可能完整地论述古罗马军团复杂的历史。
有关他的传说举不胜举.

sentences.en: The artificial ways of inducing sleep are legion, and are only alike in their ineffectuality.
sentences.cn: 人为的催眠法多不胜举, 唯一的相同处是全都无效.

sentences.en: The festival brings together traditional workers in the crafts and a legion of youthful admirers.
sentences.cn: 传统手工艺艺人和大批爱好手工艺的青年人汇集在一起庆祝这个节日.

sentences.en: The French Foreign Legion was founded by a Royal Ordinance, written on a small piece of official Prench War Office notepaper dated March 9 th, 1931.
sentences.cn: 法国外籍兵团是按照皇家的一项法令建立的, 这项法令记录在一小页法国陆军部公函信笺上, 日期是1931年3月9日.

sentences.en: The number of women who become pregnant after adopting children is legion.
sentences.cn: 领养小孩后怀孕的妇女比比皆是。
